definitions.text: A kind of wig, originally one made of worsted; a jersey.

example: Dowager went off in her jingling old coach, attended by two faithful and withered old maids of honour, and a little snuffy spindle-shanked gentleman in waiting, in a brown jasey and a green coat covered with orders â€” of which the star and the grand yellow cordon of the order of St. Michael of Pumpernickel were most conspicuous.
